=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Into The Woods (Theatrical)
Review Date: 2019/01/17
Categories: Comedy, Drama, Beautiful, Cerebral
Product Description: ['A witch threatens a curse on childless couple, unless they bring her an eclectic collection of items - tales of Little Red Riding Hood, Jack & the Beanstalk, Rapunzel and more in a lavish musical spectacular.']
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Rob Marshall'], 'Producers': ['Rob Marshall', 'John Deluca', 'Marc Platt', 'Callum McDougall'], 'Starring': ['Meryl Streep', 'Emily Blunt', 'Anna Kendrick']}
Review Text: A fun musical!
Review Title: A joy to watch.
Rating: 5.0

description: A witch threatens a curse on childless couple, unless they bring her an eclectic collection of items - tales of Little Red Riding Hood, Jack & the Beanstalk, Rapunzel and more in a lavish musical spectacular.
